name: Sirius 3D
description:
Made in 72 hours for the Score Space jam!

Controls:

  • W - accelerate
  • S - reverse/slow
  • AD - Left/Right
  • Space - Shoot
  • Shift - boost

Theme: COMBINING

I hope you enjoy!

**Note** I ---HIGHLY--- recommend downloading the windows version if you can. The HTML5 export colors and scale got all funky in the worst kind of way
